H0.text: Which Disney character is brought to life by the Blue Fairy . Geppetto

H1.text: Which Disney character is brought to life by the Blue Fairy . Tinker Bell

H2.text: Which Disney character is brought to life by the Blue Fairy . The Beast

H3.text: Which Disney character is brought to life by the Blue Fairy . PINOCCHIO

A4.text: Pinocchio was carved by a poor man named Geppetto in a Tuscan village.
